ctx: intros p q H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros p q H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros p q H1 H2 H3 H4. split. - unfold is_sqr in H4. destruct H4 as [H5 [i [H6 H7]]]. unfold is_sqr. split. + auto. + exists i. split. * auto. * auto. - unfold is_sqr in H4. destruct H4 as [H5 [i [H6 H7]]]. unfold is_sqr. split. + auto. + exists i. split. * apply (Z.mul_reg_r p q i) in H6. rewrite <- H6. auto. * auto.
